Key Match Events: Equatorial Guinea played out a 1-1 stalemate against Nigeria in their curtain-raiser.
Iban Salvador scored for Equatorial Guinea in the 36th minute against Nigeria.
Victor Osimhen equalized for Nigeria shortly after Salvador's goal.
Guinea-Bissau lost 2-0 to Ivory Coast in their opening match.
Seko Fofana and Jean-Philippe Krasso scored for Ivory Coast against Guinea-Bissau.
Pre-Game Insights: Equatorial Guinea and Guinea-Bissau are both looking to secure their first win in the Africa Cup of Nations.
Equatorial Guinea is unbeaten in their last 11 outings across all competitions.
Guinea-Bissau has conceded eight goals in their last two matches.
Iban Salvador has scored six times for Equatorial Guinea, with only Emilio Nsue scoring more in the current squad.
Federico Bikoro is set to make his 49th international cap for Equatorial Guinea.
